Either you want it for Garry's mod or to play CS in HD.

This is going to be my first review of a game on my steam account, I will make all my reviews after I have invested at least 20 hours in a game. I will give my honest opinion.

So, CSS.  I picked this game up early in my gaming career when I started out playing games on a dell d630.  At the lowest settings this game looks about the same as cranking the graphics up to high.  Most of the hours I spent in this game was playing with bots on car rides and journeys. I enjoy the gunplay and the weapons are not as in depth compared to its bigger brother.  The maps are very well designed and I didnt find a single one I absolutely hated. What makes me like this game over its bigger brother is the lesser competitive feel. You can definitely tell that CSGO was designed from the ground up to be a highly competitive game.  However that is not what I look for in a game. I tend to focus on how much fun I have had with a game. Now it might be my nostalgia from playing this at 30fps at 480p but I still think this is the game to pick up if you are looking for a fun, brief round of shooty fun.

Price / hour: 2.7 cents (€)

Ну что-же это старый добрый CSS в прошлый раз,зашел такой на сервачек все такие тихие,молчат,играю,только инфу и то в чат. Как только я заговорил мне прилетела ответка со словами: "Тсс",Ну что-же сервера не такие полные можно РАССЛАБИТЬСЯ что мале вероятно в CSGO если у вас был тяжелый день или вы просто захотели отдохнуть,то CSS в вашем распоряжении.
Плюсы: +Никто не кричит,нету орущих,бомбящих шкоьников.++
Минусы: -Проблема в том что эта игра не для РАЗГОВОРЧИВЫХ,а так все в норме.++
